title: 'Trendy and cool'
body: 'Many of my clients do ask me where to buy this trendy pencils. It works as good as any other pencil but adds to trend quotient.'

title: 'seller is selling low quality pencils and seller will also steal some pencils'
body: ******My experience buying Online****** I didn't like the product because the package was in bad shape, had less number of pencils and all the pencils were of bad quality, pencil's paint was scratched and the wood was cracked too, you can easily split the wood into two strip. the sharpener was used one, not new. seller also stole my pencils before sending the package for delivery, i got only 8 pencils in bad shape. over all I had bad experience. better buy from store. *****About the product****** I have used the pencils before(bought from local store). the pencils are nice, colourful and unique(because it's black with colourful pencil dust)

title: 'High delivery charge!'
